glsa.title: fcron: Information disclosure
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability has been found in fcron, allowing local attackers to conduct symlink attacks.

background.p: fcron is a periodic command scheduler for Unix-based systems

description.p: The fcrontab function contains a race condition relating to symlinks.

impact.p: A local attacker could perform symlink attacks to read arbitrary files with the privileges of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All fcron users should upgrade to the latest version:
